title: Springs of Life Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe is connected to Springs of Life health food store and has a 100% organic menu featuring live juices, smoothies, wraps, salads, soups and sandwiches.  Specialty items are the mushroom burger and the beet and black bean burger. Space to rent for events on Sat-Sun.
